title: Frank Scott, MD, Excellence in Orthopedics Endowed Fund
description: To provide support for the Department of Orthopedics in the School of Medicine at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus. The Fund will provide support for educational programming for residents and fellows within the Department.
marketingContent: To provide support for the Department of Orthopedics in the School of Medicine at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus. The Fund will provide support for educational programming for residents and fellows within the Department.
